snippet: “Rise of the Guardians,” based on the “Guardians of Childhood” books by William Joyce, imagines a team of mythic beings.
abstract: Dreamworks Animation film Rise of the Guardians, based on Guardians of Childhood books by William Joyce, imagines a team of popular childhood figures like Sandman, Tooth Fairy, Man in the Moon, Easter Bunny and Santa Claus protecting the hopes and dreams of children everywhere.
lead_paragraph: “Rise of the Guardians,” based on the “Guardians of Childhood” books by William Joyce, imagines a team of mythic beings.

headline.seo: Creating Environments for ‘Rise of the Guardians’
headline.main: Heroes Born Out of the Beliefs of Children
headline.print_headline:
Heroes Born
Out of the Beliefs
Of Children
